answers.answer: Hi, I'm Casey I'm also going to be a ftm! I'm 25 weeks, due on may 26th with a baby boy! :)).  I'm on here a lot to because my hubby works all the time and I'm always home alone..  you can message me anytime or add me on Facebook @ Casey Sutton :)
Sounds like we are all in the same boat. I'm 19 w 1 d. Due July 8th. I'm a little behind you but open to chat (:
I'm Megan, I'm 24+4 Due May 31 With A Boy. I'm Also On Fb @ Megan Imbragulia
Ftm w a boy too:) may 8th.
Oh yay boys in may... lol I can't wait. I have my gestational diabetes test today kinda scared.
Were due on the same day :)
I take that test on the 27 of this month, I'm scared to! Lol

im due may 16th with a boy :) I have my gestational diabetes test coming up too.  im nervous about it too. just gotta hope for the best. :) my pregnancy has been perfect apart from the weight gain and kicks I dont feel pregnant. :) so its been really good! :)

question: My name is anna and I  am a ftm. I am 26 weeks and due may 17th. I am on here all the time and I get really bored cause my man is always gone due to work and have no one to talk to about pregnancy. So I was just hoping to find a due date buddy. Some one who is willing to just chat and talk about anything. Help me through this.
title: mommy buddies
